column4: i have a dfi lanparty motherboard, it has onboard raid and i have 4 identical drives in the computer but I can't figure out how to set it up in BIOS - I realize this isn't really ubuntu related but I use ubuntu so i thought someone here may help
you will have two interfaces - 2 drive to 1  ensure they are enable
when booting look for promt should idicate f2 or similar to set up raid
i did but when you hit f4 or ctrl + s it says "No Device Detected, Utility disabled! Press any key to continue
